title: Here's a few fonts to ID!
content:
Hey guys let me know if anyone can identify any of these guys.

(The numbers are the same typeface.)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Allure](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1229.JPG) | 469.17 KB |
| [Poetry in Motion](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1419.jpg) | 613.97 KB |
| [Production Spec](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2051.JPG) | 1.74 MB |
| [AROMES](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2468_0.JPG) | 1.42 MB |
| [Pretty Pieces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2942.PNG) | 289.27 KB |
| [7](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1444.jpg) | 167.38 KB |
| [5](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1445.jpg) | 148.67 KB |
| [10](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1446.JPG) | 533.53 KB |
author: MJMerlino

comments.content:
Allure: [Sackers Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/sackers-roman)  
Poetry in Motion: [Burgues Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/burgues-script)  
Production Spec: Harabara  
7/5/10: [Reina](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106141146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/argentina-lian-types/reina)
